content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Remember to enjoy the ride, take in the scenery, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any further adjustments or guidance.

It's great that you're excited about the longer bike ride – it's a big milestone in your triathlon training! Make sure to celebrate your accomplishment afterwards, and don't forget to refuel and recover properly.

Keep in mind that consistency and patience are key in triathlon training. Stay committed to your plan, and you'll be ready to crush your triathlon goal in no time!

If you have any more questions or need any further assistance, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Good luck on your ride this weekend, and I look forward to hearing about your progress!
